entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 11:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: S 25 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain at times heavy near midnight. Snow at times heavy near White Bay late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 15 cm near White Bay. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
